entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `OrderedSet<T>` #110882
    Future

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] xcode15+ linker issue #97745
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonUnmappedMemberHandling.DisallowExceptTypeDiscriminator #110466

PullRequests

Updated

  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #110845
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: split loop headers that are also try entries #110880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GetNormalizedLength on iOS and similar platforms #110723
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix HostActivation.Tests unknown-rid #110687
    area-HostModel, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • Links to app.config is case sensitive #2768
    Discussion
  • Prepare tool for installation on 2.1 and using CLI extensibility model on 2.0 #9492
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [dotnet-watch] Microsoft.DotNet.HotReload.Agent.PipeRpc source package #45603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static web assets] Be more leanient when applying compression negotiation #45598
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Agent fixes #45369
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Warn on :: use in dotnet new install towards #45422 #45552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support package@version syntax in dotnet new install, partial fix for #45422 #45545
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Propagate marked attributes from method type parameters to type parameters of synthesized types. #76492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop, fortunes_ef #59594
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation #59593

Closed

  • *@(FIGHT/LIVE)*!!Oleksandr Usyk vs Tyson Fury 2 LiVe 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐬 FrEe BrOaDcAsT oN TV Guide & 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 22 December 2024 #59595
  • Blazor net9 PathBase not working #59521
  • [BUG] . NET9.0 Blazor Web App cannot allow cross domain websites to display nested iframe tags #59532
  • Restricting Users to a Single Circuit in Blazor Server #59576
  • Perf regression: single_query #59589
  • Null value being passed to the Claim constructor in the UserClaimsPrincipalFactory<TUser> on Identity Endpoint Login .Net 8 #54669

PullRequests

Updated

  • Upgrade Facebook Graph API version to v21.0 #59387
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Page Title is not shown in correct position for Right To Left Languages #13435
    Backlog
  • Globe image appearing when selecting an anchor tag in MAUI WebView & crash in VS2022 #26615
  • [MAUI] The UI page moves up after the virtual keyboard pops up, and the top content is not visible #22309
    Backlog
  • [iOS] MenuItem Command not executed with FlyoutHeader set #19149
    Backlog
  • CollectionView's Items Aren't Selected When a Parent Has a TapGestureRecognizer #26182
    Backlog
  • Cannot apply app theme bindings for VisualStateGroup Setters in code #26620
  • LinearGradientBrush as background page has an issue on IOS screen rotation #23501
    Backlog
  • CollectionView snaps randomly when we give horizontal and vertical spacing #19037
    Backlog
  • PopoverBackgroundViewType not working in Mac #18903
    Backlog
  • [Android] Numeric Editor's cursor is not visible when tapping it inside a ListView #22745
    Backlog
  • More infos on warning: Mismatch between the specified x:DataType and the current binding context #24349
    Backlog
  • BlazorWebView DisposeAsync implementation Disposes the WebView on the wrong thread #26746
    .NET 10 Planning
  • FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on Windows for the Tabbedpage #26752
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 60 #26755
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 61 #26761
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed #26769 - crash when iOS app is running on MacOS #26771
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR4
